title: Where would the sign most likely be seen

content.description:
Read this public sign.

為了留住綠色，留住美麗，讓我們的家園更美好，我們不使用一次性筷子。

为了留住绿色，留住美丽，让我们的家园更美好，我们不使用一次性筷子。
content.question: Where would the sign most likely be seen?

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
